author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
As we hurtle towards the end of the year, it's once again time for a chunky roundup of things that we'd recommend as gifts for those who love games. Whether that person is a loved one, a legal representative, or maybe just good olde "YOU" - we hope you enjoy this barrage of suggestions and opinions!

See this entire list and watch our full reviews here: https://bit.ly/SUSDGG24

Support the Show: https://bit.ly/SupportSUSD / http://ko-fi.com/shutupandsitdown / https://www.patreon.com/shutupandsitdown
